item.title: Fiber to the Boonies
item.description:
For a long time, the idea of “rural broadband” seemed contradictory. While cities enjoyed a variety of high-speed internet options, from DSL and cable to fiber optic connections, rural areas remained stuck with slow dial-up or satellite internet. Although high-speed business lines have become more affordable, fiber optic cables in rural areas were deemed too expensive. However, an organization in Vermont is challenging this assumption. ValleyFiber, led by Dr. Timothy Nulty, is bringing fiber optic broadband to rural homes and businesses in Vermont’s Upper Valley...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/fiber-to-the-boonies/
